title: Flight Delay Analysis & Prediction
description: Analysis of flight performance metrics, delays, cancellations and diversions. Identifying patterns and key contribution factors.

title: Uber Analytics
description: Structured Uber ride data for scalability and efficiency, building a pipeline to process 100K+ records for fast analysis and visualization.

title: London Bike Sharing
description: Analyzed London bike-sharing data with an interactive Tableau dashboard, revealing ride trends, moving averages, and weather impact.
